src/main/java/genericUI/BrightnessSlider.note: This code is a constructor for a BrightnessSlider class that sets up a slider component for adjusting brightness based on the given hue and saturation values. It initializes the slider with a range from 0 to 100, hides ticks and labels, sets preferred size, and applies a custom UI for gradient appearance. One potential quirk could be the hard-coded range values, which may limit flexibility if the range needs to be changed in the future. A suggestion for improvement would be to make the range values configurable parameters to enhance the slider's reusability.
